case.title: Looking for an older man - 23 (UK)
case.text: Hi, Im looking for an older man, 40-60 to teach me about the physical pleasures. Im very, very inexperienced and I'd love someone kind and loving to show me how its done. Im 5"6, curvy, pale skin with long brown hair. Im well spoken and well educated, I love to cook, travel and read. If your interested please send me a message x
